subject: p16848073
History: Cough with trouble swallowing. Evaluate for pneumonia.
Findings: Frontal and lateral radiographs of the chest were acquired. The lungs are clear. The cardiac and mediastinal contours are normal. There is blunting of the right costophrenic angle, consistent with scarring or a trace pleural effusion. There is no left pleural effusion. No pneumothorax is seen. Note is made of a gastric pull-through.
Impression: No acute cardiac or pulmonary process. Possible tiny right pleural effusion versus scarring.
